promoData.promoText: Enjoy lessons specially tailored to your own interests and needs.
Share and talk about your favorite topics with a community of people just as passionate about Spanish as your are.
Navigate Spanish by actually using and speaking if and not just by theory and grammar.
Immerse yourself in the Hispanic culture through its language.

themeOneAboutSection.heading: Get to Know us
themeOneAboutSection.headingText: You don't need to remain stuck in an intermediate Spanish level, or learning only the grammar without enjoying the language. We are here to guide you on the adventure of your life through learning about Hispanic culture and achieving the fluency you've always dreamed of.
themeOneAboutSection.headingTextTwo: Español con E is an online Spanish academy conformed by a group of professionals with the purpose of helping students to reach their goal of mastering the language and get into the hispanic culture in a simple. effective and funny way. We aim to make the learing process as exciting and enjoyable as trip through Latinamerica.
